title: Philly Cheese & Chicken Sandwich
directions: Season chicken with salt, pepper and oregano. In a large skillet add oil, turn to medium-high heat, add chicken and brown on both sides. Add peppers and onions and continue cooking until tender.
Place open rolls on a cookie sheet, add cooked chicken, peppers and onions, top off with a cheese slice on each roll. Place rolls in oven and heat until cheese is melted.
ingredients: 2 (1 pound) chicken breast filets, skinless, sliced into strips
Kosher or sea salt to taste
1 red bell pepper, cored, seeded, sliced into strips
1 green bell pepper, cored, seed, sliced into strips
